title: Inspection of exotic animals
context: [PART IVA.] EXOTIC ANIMALS; REIMBURSABLE INSPECTION [ยง159-31] Inspection of exotic animals. Persons desiring certification as to wholesomeness and unadulteration for meat and meat products derived from exotic animals may request the department to conduct an inspection under this chapter. [L 1990, c 139, pt of ยง1; am L 1991, c 88, ยง1]
